timeline.bodyText: This wording needs work. Prepending the description with "Configures" doesn't make it more clear or concise. For instance, I'd write the following for this config: "Duration the mining indicator and session stats are displayed before being reset."

timeline.bodyText:
Users can check configs to discover they can enable one or the other, no need to explicitly state that here.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            	description = "Show mining statistics and/or ore respawn timers",
          
          
            
            	description = "Show mining statistics and ore respawn timers",
timeline.author: Nightfirecat

timeline.bodyText:
Plugin search already checks the plugin name and description for terms, this doesn't need to be defined here as well.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            	tags = {"overlay", "skilling", "timers", "mining"},
          
          
            
            	tags = {"overlay", "skilling", "timers"},
timeline.author: Nightfirecat

timeline.bodyText: Since each of these test methods contains the same body, move the messages into a list and run these tests against each message from the list in a loop.

timeline.message: Address poor grammar, loop through messages for the tests & other recommendation.

timeline.bodyText: The config check should be after the session check as it is more expensive / forces the config key to be hot in the config cache
timeline.author: Adam-

timeline.bodyText: You could just make one test per message, it would avoid bugs related to keeping state around in the plugin on accident. Though this does look correct currently.
